title: Bruce Springsteen Cancels North Carolina Concert Over ‘Bathroom Law’
subtitle: Rock icon Bruce Springsteen  has apologized to fans in the Tar Heel State after cancelling a show in protest of a controversial LGBT bill.
author: Brooke Binkowski
vclaim: Bruce Springsteen cancelled a show in Greensboro, North Carolina, over the state's so-called 'bathroom law.'
